overview: Prior to Webaroo, Bill was a founder and held senior sales positions at SystemSoft, which in the early 1990’s became a market leader in the development of Windows system-level software solutions. He has worked as a sales, marketing and business development executive consultant to both U.S. and Taiwanese corporations and has been an investor and board advisor in numerous startups including Convergence (Amazon) and WebEd (Sylvan Learning). He has held sales positions at Phoenix Technologies, Graphic Software Systems and Digital Research Corporation. Bill received his B.S. degree in Marketing and Economics from Boston College.
